item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades Wells Fargo, sees limited upside ahead
item.description: Don't expect much more upside for Wells Fargo, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for their robust growth outlook
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three stocks, including Nvidia and CrowdStrike, that are favored by Wall Street.

item.title: Trump is wielding the power of the state to back critical mineral companies. These are the possible next targets
item.description: The Pentagon deal with MP Materials could provide a blueprint to protect U.S miners against market manipulation by China, executives and analysts say.

item.title: Want to beat the market for the long term? JPMorgan says bet on termites
item.description: Rollins could gain ground as the firm deepens its push into the "resilient," multibillion-dollar pest control market in the U.S. and abroad, per J.P. ...

item.title: BYD bids Warren Buffett's Berkshire an unfazed farewell: Selling is 'normal'
item.description: As it confirmed Berkshire has sold the last of its shares, the Chinese EV maker thanked Buffett and Munger for their 17-year investment.
